languages.text: "Что за тоска чуть не лишила тебя разума?"
"What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"
languages.original_text: "Что за тоска чуть не лишила тебя разума?"

traits.locale_text: "What caused you such grief that you nearly lost your reason?"
"What caused you such grief that you nearly lost your reason?"
"What caused you such grief, you nearly lost your mind?"
"What caused you such grief, you nearly lost your mind?"
"What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"
"What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qui a pu vous causer tant de peine que vous avez presque perdu la tête ? »
languages.original_text: "What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qui a pu vous causer tant de peine que vous avez presque perdu la tête ? »

languages.text: “你差点就发了疯，你心里究竟怀着怎样的痛苦？”
languages.original_text: "What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"

traits.locale_text: “你差点就发了疯，你心里究竟怀着怎样的痛苦？”

languages.text: 「正気を失いかけるとは、どれほどの悲しみだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"

traits.locale_text: 「正気を失いかけるとは、どれほどの悲しみだろうか？」

languages.text: "Wie groß muss die Trauer sein, dass sie Euch fast den Verstand gekostet hätte?"
languages.original_text: "What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Was hat bei Euch solche Trauer ausgelöst, dass Ihr dabei fast den Verstand verloren habt?"

languages.text: «¿Qué clase de pesar le ha afligido tanto como para hacer que casi pierda la razón?».
languages.original_text: "What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué clase de pesar le ha afligido tanto como para hacer que casi pierda la razón?».

languages.text: "Neredeyse aklını yitirdiğine göre epey büyük bir keder olmalı."
languages.original_text: "What kind of grief must it be, to have nearly cost you your sanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Neredeyse aklını yitirdiğine göre epey büyük bir keder olmalı."
